rules: Rule1: If the soil is fertilized with organic matter, then provided that the seeds are not planted in the spring, the fields are irrigated in the summer.
Rule2: Either the soil is fertilized with organic matter or the soil is fertilized with chemical agents.
Rule3: In the event that the organic farm is certified, the organic standard is approved.
Rule4: Provided the organic standard is approved, if the soil is fertilized with chemical agents, then whenever the seeds are not planted in the spring, the fields are irrigated in the summer.
Rule5: If the harvest is scheduled for autumn, then the harvest is timed optimally.
Rule6: Either the grain is processed at the mill or the vegetable is processed at the facility.
Rule7: In the case that the vegetable is processed at the facility, if the harvest is scheduled for autumn, then the operation is profitable annually.
Rule8: Provided the supply chain is monitored by the system, then if the grain is processed at the mill, whenever the harvest is scheduled for autumn, the operation is profitable annually.
Rule9: If the produce is regulated by the agency, then the sample is analyzed in the laboratory.
Rule10: If the grain is stored in the silo, then the flour is packaged in the bag.
Rule11: Provided the food is inspected for safety, then if the produce is regulated by the agency, the operation is profitable annually.
Rule12: In the event that the quality is inspected by control, then under the condition that the produce is regulated by the agency, the operation is profitable annually.

Rule13: If the compliance is documented in records, then should it not be the case that either the food is inspected for safety or the quality is inspected by control, the batch is not rejected based on standards.
Rule14: When the heavy pesticide is banned, then if it is not the case that the operation not being profitable annually implies the crop is not harvested from the field, the GMO crop is not modified.
Rule15: Provided the sustainable practice is adopted, the chemical use is restricted.
Rule16: Either the sustainable practice is adopted or the organic certification is maintained.
Rule17: Under the condition that the organic certification is maintained, the certification is renewed annually.
Rule18: When the certification is renewed annually, the heavy pesticide is banned.
Rule19: If the flour is packaged in the bag, then the product is distributed to the market.
Rule20: Either the goods are exported internationally or if the product is distributed to the market, then the crop is not harvested from the field.
Rule21: When the shipment is delivered to the retailer, then either the wheat is transported by the truck or the corn is transported by the truck.
Rule22: If the inventory is stored in the warehouse, then the merchandise is returned to the supplier.
Rule23: Provided the supply is managed digitally, then if the shipment is not delivered to the retailer, the inventory is stored in the warehouse.
Rule24: In the event that the supply is managed manually, then under the condition that the shipment is not delivered to the retailer, the inventory is stored in the warehouse.
Rule25: If the logistics are optimized by software, then either the supply is managed digitally or the supply is managed manually.
Rule26: Whenever the routes are optimized through planning, then either the supply is managed digitally or the supply is managed manually.
Rule27: Either the warehouse is automated by the system or the inventory tracking is automated.
Rule28: If the wheat is transported by the truck, then whenever the flour is packaged in the bag, the crop is not harvested from the field.
Rule29: Under the condition that the inventory tracking is automated, the routes are optimized through planning.
Rule30: Should the platform be integrated with ERP, then if the warehouse is automated by the system, the logistics are optimized by software.
Rule31: Either the platform is integrated with ERP or the system is integrated via API.
Rule32: If the system is integrated via API, then the devices are connected by IoT.
Rule33: When the devices are connected by IoT, then under the condition that the warehouse is automated by the system, the logistics are optimized by software.
Rule34: If the local producer is sourced, then the wheat is transported by the truck.
Rule35: Provided the imported goods are sourced, the corn is transported by the truck.
Rule36: In the event that the product is expired by the date, the item is recalled for safety.
Rule37: If the harvest is timed optimally, then the food quality is preserved.
Rule38: Should the corn be transported by the truck, then if the flour is packaged in the bag, the crop is not harvested from the field.
Rule39: Provided the produce is tested in the lab, the operation is profitable annually.
Rule40: Whenever the sample is analyzed in the laboratory, the quality standard is verified.
Rule41: When the equipment is calibrated regularly, then if the quality standard is verified, the produce is tested in the lab.
Rule42: Provided the machine is maintained on schedule, the equipment is calibrated regularly.
Rule43: If the device is repaired by the technician, then the machine is maintained on schedule.
Rule44: Either the device is repaired by the technician or the equipment is serviced under contract.
Rule45: Under the condition that the system is upgraded to the version, then if the equipment is serviced under contract, the machine is maintained on schedule.
Rule46: If the food is spoiled in the warehouse, then the food is contaminated in the storage.
Rule47: Provided the food is spoiled in the warehouse, it is not the case that the food is contaminated in the storage.

Rule48: Either the process is audited internally or if it is not the case that either the food is inspected for safety or the quality is inspected by control, the batch is not rejected based on standards.
Rule49: If the performance is evaluated by metric, then whenever the process is audited internally, the procedure is reviewed externally.
Rule50: Provided the seeds are planted in the spring, the operation is profitable annually.
Rule51: Should it not be the case that either the food is inspected for safety or the quality is inspected by control, the batch is rejected based on standards.
Rule52: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the wheat is transported by the truck or the corn is transported by the truck, the food is spoiled in the warehouse.
Rule53: Provided it is not the case that either the local producer is sourced or the imported goods are sourced, the product is expired by the date.
Rule54: If it is not the case that if the food quality is preserved then the operation is profitable annually, then the shelf life is extended by treatment.

Rule55: Should it not be the case that if it is not the case that if the food quality is preserved then the operation is profitable annually, then the shelf life is not extended by treatment, the preservation method is improved.

Rule56: Provided it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the food quality is preserved then the operation is profitable annually, then the shelf life is not extended by treatment, it is not the case that the preservation method is improved.
Rule57: If it is not the case that if the operation is not profitable annually then the crop is not harvested from the field, then the GMO crop is modified.
Rule58: Should the supply chain not be monitored by the system, the shipment is tracked via GPS.
Rule59: Provided the supply chain is not monitored by the system, it is not the case that the shipment is tracked via GPS.
Rule60: If the seeds are not planted in the spring, then it is not the case that the fields are irrigated in the summer.
Rule61: Provided the operation is not profitable annually, the crop is harvested from the field.
Rule62: Should the operation not be profitable annually, the grain is stored in the silo.
facts: Fact1: The organic farm is certified.
Fact2: The harvest is scheduled for autumn.
Fact3: The produce is regulated by the agency.
Fact4: The compliance is documented in records.
Fact5: The system is upgraded to the version.
Fact6: The performance is evaluated by metric.
Fact7: It is not the case that the chemical use is restricted.
Fact8: It is not the case that the goods are exported internationally.
Fact9: It is not the case that the merchandise is returned to the supplier.
Fact10: It is not the case that the item is recalled for safety.
Fact11: It is not the case that the procedure is reviewed externally.
